name: Asociación de Navegantes de Recreo
membership: European Boating Association, Real Asociación Nacional de Cruceros, Federación Balear de Pesac Responsable, REal Liga Naval Española
memberOrga: Real Asociación Nacional de Cruceros, Real Liga Naval Española, Asociación de Navegantes del Mediterráneo, Federación Balear de Pesca Responsable
goal: Defense of the boat users rights and interests in Spain, promoting the issuance of simpler and more understandable boating regulations in Spain and Europe
interests: Borders and Security, Climate Action, Consumers, Customs, Environment, Foreign affairs and security policy, Fraud prevention, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Transport
euInitiatives: Recreational boating, boating and yachting industry, maritime and inland waterways regulations, including safety, radiocommunications, skipper licensing and yachts registration.Promotion of boating as a leisure and spporting activity.
